BIOTA_COMMENT: The collected individuals from each sample were similar in terms: age (10–16 years), a spectrum of weight (0.55–2.75 kg), a spectrum of a Condition Factor (0.504–1.160). Part of individuals from each haul was checked for sex (predominance of males 65:35) and maturity of gonads (mixed 2–4 stage).
